name: World Covid 19 stats
author: Viitorcloud

sections.description:
World Covid 19 stats will show corona current cases and more information about COVID-19. You will be able to show the relevant information: cases, deaths, recovered, and Active on you website.

No coding required.

Put shortcode [wd_covid19] in backend page,post or widget.

shortcode support in sidebar using the ‘Custom HTML’ widget.

Compatibility with wordpress 5.4+

Get Involved

ViitorCloud believes in an active community support so with such plugins we try to make life easy for developers & of course customers. Don’t forget to subscribe our newsletter.

THIRD PARTY API INFOMATION

  • API website:- https://disease.sh/
  • API docs:- https://disease.sh/docs/
  • License:- https://github.com/disease-sh/API/blob/master/LICENSE
  • Privacy policy:- https://github.com/disease-sh/API/blob/master/privacy.md

Please read privacy policy of this API carefully before using this plugin inside your website.

As this plugin functionality and data totally depends on third party apis.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. After activation, you can go through wordpress post/page backend.
sections.faq:
How can I use this plugin?
Put shortcode in any page or post and show in front.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 * First public release.
1.1.0 * Support to custom post types
1.1.0 * Compatible with your latest wordpress version
sections.screenshots: 1. World Covid 19 stats record
